entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:31 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 26 %
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
